meanings.definition: A substance or agent that kills or inhibits the growth of microorganisms.
meanings.sent1: The hospital used powerful microbicides to clean the surgical equipment.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying new types of microbicides to fight bacteria effectively.
meanings.sent3: The tiny superheroes in the comic book used microbicides to defeat the evil germs.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against infection, microbicides act as microscopic warriors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained how microbicides work by showing a simple animation.

meanings.definition: Products used to prevent the transmission of sexually transmitted infections.
meanings.sent1: The health clinic distributed free microbicides to promote safe sex practices.
meanings.sent2: It is important to use microbicides consistently to reduce the risk of STIs.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit humorously featured a character who always carried microbicides in their pocket.
meanings.sent4: Microbicides are like shields that protect against harmful infections during intimate moments.
meanings.sent5: The advertisement emphasized the effectiveness of microbicides in preventing diseases.
